verses.text: \w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* almost \w reached|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w having|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w far|strong="G3588"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* Bethphage, \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Olives|strong="G1636"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w sent|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\wj “\+w Go|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w village|strong="G2968"\+w* facing \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*,”\wj* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj “\+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w immediately|strong="G2112"\+w* \+w find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w donkey|strong="G3688"\+w* tethered, \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* foal \+w by|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w her|strong="G1519"\+w* side; \+w untie|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w her|strong="G1519"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w lead|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w her|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w here|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w anyone|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w says|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w anything|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*, \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3588"\+w* – ‘\+w The|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Master|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w wants|strong="G5532"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w*’; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* send \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1161"\+w* once.”\wj*

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* fulfillment \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* words \w in|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* –

‘\w Say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Zion|strong="G4622"\w* – “\w Your|strong="G2532"\w* \w King|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w gentle|strong="G4239"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* riding \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w donkey|strong="G3688"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w foal|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w beast|strong="G5268"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w burden|strong="G5268"\w*.”’

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w directed|strong="G4929"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w stirred|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* –

\w The|strong="G1519"\w* \w next|strong="G1519"\w* \w morning|strong="G4404"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w returning|strong="G1877"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, Jesus \w became|strong="G3588"\w* \w hungry|strong="G3983"\w*;

\wj “\+w I|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w*,”\wj* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \wj “\+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* don’\+w t|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w doubt|strong="G1252"\+w*, \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w only|strong="G3440"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w what|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w has|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w been|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w fig|strong="G4808"\+w* \+w tree|strong="G4808"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w were|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w hill|strong="G3735"\+w* ‘\+w Be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w lifted|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w up|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* hurled \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sea|strong="G2281"\+w*!’ \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w would|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w done|strong="G4160"\+w*.\wj*

\wj \+w It|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w about|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w*’s baptism. \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w was|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w its|strong="G1537"\+w* origin? Divine \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* human?” \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w they|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w began|strong="G1161"\+w* arguing \+w among|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w themselves|strong="G1438"\+w*, “\+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w we|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* ‘divine,’ \+w he|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w will|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w to|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w us|strong="G3004"\+w* ‘\+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w then|strong="G3767"\+w* didn’\+w t|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w you|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w him|strong="G3588"\+w*?’\wj*
